name: kobozo-plugins
description: Kobozo's custom Claude Code plugins for UI development and style guide management

plugins.name: ui-checker
plugins.description: Design system by skill - natural language triggers for UI validation, component creation, and style guide management with Playwright and Tailwind CSS

plugins.name: api-documenter
plugins.description: API documentation by skill - say 'document API' to generate OpenAPI specs and human-readable docs with specialized agents

plugins.name: test-suite-generator
plugins.description: Test generation by skill - say 'generate tests' for unit/integration tests, 'coverage report' for analysis, keeps commands for file-based operations

plugins.name: security-auditor
plugins.description: Security by skill - say 'security audit' or 'check vulnerabilities' for comprehensive scans, hooks block vulnerabilities proactively

plugins.name: performance-optimizer
plugins.description: Performance by skill - say 'profile performance' or 'optimize bundle' for analysis, hooks catch N+1 queries proactively

plugins.name: data-privacy-manager
plugins.description: Privacy compliance by skill - say 'privacy audit' or 'GDPR check' for compliance scans, 'anonymize data' for data protection

plugins.name: db-schema-manager
plugins.description: Database schema by skill - say 'analyze schema' or 'generate migration' for guidance, commands handle file-based operations

plugins.name: i18n-manager
plugins.description: Internationalization by skill - say 'extract translations' or 'validate locales' for guidance, commands handle file-based operations

plugins.name: onboarding-assistant
plugins.description: Onboarding by skill - say 'design onboarding' or 'create product tour' for comprehensive flow design with specialized agents

plugins.name: code-architect
plugins.description: Architecture by skill - say 'analyze architecture' for design guidance, commands generate Mermaid diagrams and ADRs

plugins.name: clean-code-checker
plugins.description: Clean code by skill - say 'analyze code quality' or 'check code smells' for guidance, hooks provide real-time SOLID/DRY feedback

plugins.name: documentation-writer
plugins.description: Documentation by skill - say 'document this' or 'write docs for' to generate feature docs, API references, and tutorials

plugins.name: bug-fixer
plugins.description: Bug fixing by skill - say 'fix bug' or 'debug this' for systematic analysis, fix design, and validation with specialized agents

plugins.name: docker-compose-manager
plugins.description: Docker by skill - methodology and best practices for containerization, docker-agent for MCP operations, specialized agents for orchestration, nginx, and service management

plugins.name: brainstorm
plugins.description: Brainstorming by skill - say 'new idea', 'new feature', 'brainstorm', or 'let's explore' for research-driven ideation before coding

plugins.name: dead-code-detector
plugins.description: Dead code by skill - say 'find dead code' or 'remove unused code' for scans, hooks catch orphaned code proactively

plugins.name: feature-flags
plugins.description: Feature flags by skill - say 'add feature flag' or 'set up feature flags' for implementation guidance, supports multiple patterns

plugins.name: image-generator
plugins.description: Image generation by skill - say 'generate image' or 'create image' for AI image creation with Nano Banana (Gemini) or DALL-E

plugins.name: code-expert-agent
plugins.description: Deep code research skill and agent powered by ChunkHound - provides systematic methodology for discovering existing solutions, mapping architecture, and identifying patterns before coding

plugins.name: ralph-wiggum
plugins.description: Multi-agent development loop - Dev, Code Review, QA, and Doc Writer agents work together with quality gates and targeted feedback for iterative refinement
